sqlMap.sql: INSERT INTO popularize_info(id, type, content, teamId, updateTime, updateUser, videoUrl, createUser, userId, title, createTime) values (:id, :type, :content, :teamId, :updateTime, :updateUser, :videoUrl, :createUser, :userId, :title, :createTime)

UPDATE popularize_info SET type = :type <#if content?exists && content != ""> , content = :content </#if> <#if teamId?exists && teamId != ""> , teamId = :teamId </#if> <#if updateTime?exists && updateTime != ""> , updateTime = :updateTime </#if> <#if updateUser?exists && updateUser != ""> , updateUser = :updateUser </#if> <#if videoUrl?exists && videoUrl != ""> , videoUrl = :videoUrl </#if> <#if createUser?exists && createUser != ""> , createUser = :createUser </#if> <#if userId?exists && userId != ""> , userId = :userId </#if> <#if title?exists && title != ""> , title = :title </#if> <#if createTime?exists && createTime != ""> , createTime = :createTime </#if> WHERE id = :id

DELETE FROM popularize_info WHERE 1=1 <#if type?exists && type != ""> AND type = :type </#if> <#if content?exists && content != ""> AND content = :content </#if> <#if teamId?exists && teamId != ""> AND teamId = :teamId </#if> <#if updateTime?exists && updateTime != ""> AND updateTime = :updateTime </#if> <#if updateUser?exists && updateUser != ""> AND updateUser = :updateUser </#if> <#if videoUrl?exists && videoUrl != ""> AND videoUrl = :videoUrl </#if> <#if createUser?exists && createUser != ""> AND createUser = :createUser </#if> <#if userId?exists && userId != ""> AND userId = :userId </#if> <#if title?exists && title != ""> AND title = :title </#if> <#if createTime?exists && createTime != ""> AND createTime = :createTime </#if> <#if id?exists && id != ""> AND id = :id </#if>

SELECT id, type, content, teamId, updateTime, updateUser, videoUrl, createUser, userId, title, createTime FROM popularize_info WHERE 1=1 <#if type?exists && type != ""> AND type = :type </#if> <#if content?exists && content != ""> AND content = :content </#if> <#if teamId?exists && teamId != ""> AND teamId = :teamId </#if> <#if updateTime?exists && updateTime != ""> AND updateTime = :updateTime </#if> <#if updateUser?exists && updateUser != ""> AND updateUser = :updateUser </#if> <#if videoUrl?exists && videoUrl != ""> AND videoUrl = :videoUrl </#if> <#if createUser?exists && createUser != ""> AND createUser = :createUser </#if> <#if userId?exists && userId != ""> AND userId = :userId </#if> <#if title?exists && title != ""> AND title = :title </#if> <#if createTime?exists && createTime != ""> AND createTime = :createTime </#if> <#if id?exists && id != ""> AND id = :id </#if> <#if orderBy?exists && orderBy !="" > ORDER BY :orderBy <#if orderType?exists && orderType !="" > :orderType </#if> </#if> <#if startIndex?exists && startIndex !="" && maxCount?exists && maxCount !="" > LIMIT :startIndex,:maxCount </#if>

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM popularize_info WHERE 1=1 <#if type?exists && type != ""> AND type = :type </#if> <#if content?exists && content != ""> AND content = :content </#if> <#if teamId?exists && teamId != ""> AND teamId = :teamId </#if> <#if updateTime?exists && updateTime != ""> AND updateTime = :updateTime </#if> <#if updateUser?exists && updateUser != ""> AND updateUser = :updateUser </#if> <#if videoUrl?exists && videoUrl != ""> AND videoUrl = :videoUrl </#if> <#if createUser?exists && createUser != ""> AND createUser = :createUser </#if> <#if userId?exists && userId != ""> AND userId = :userId </#if> <#if title?exists && title != ""> AND title = :title </#if> <#if createTime?exists && createTime != ""> AND createTime = :createTime </#if> <#if id?exists && id != ""> AND id = :id </#if> <#if orderBy?exists && orderBy !="" > ORDER BY :orderBy <#if orderType?exists && orderType !="" > :orderType </#if> </#if>

SELECT id, type, content, teamId, updateTime, updateUser, videoUrl, createUser, userId, title, createTime FROM popularize_info WHERE 1=1 <#if type?exists && type != ""> AND type = :type </#if> <#if content?exists && content != ""> AND content = :content </#if> <#if teamId?exists && teamId != ""> AND teamId = :teamId </#if> <#if updateTime?exists && updateTime != ""> AND updateTime = :updateTime </#if> <#if updateUser?exists && updateUser != ""> AND updateUser = :updateUser </#if> <#if videoUrl?exists && videoUrl != ""> AND videoUrl = :videoUrl </#if> <#if createUser?exists && createUser != ""> AND createUser = :createUser </#if> <#if userId?exists && userId != ""> AND userId = :userId </#if> <#if title?exists && title != ""> AND title = :title </#if> <#if createTime?exists && createTime != ""> AND createTime = :createTime </#if> <#if id?exists && id != ""> AND id = :id </#if> <#if orderBy?exists && orderBy!="" && orderType?exists> ORDER BY :orderBy :orderType </#if> <#if startIndex?exists && startIndex !="" && maxCount?exists && maxCount !="" > LIMIT :startIndex,:maxCount </#if>

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM popularize_info WHERE 1=1 <#if type?exists && type != ""> AND type = :type </#if> <#if content?exists && content != ""> AND content = :content </#if> <#if teamId?exists && teamId != ""> AND teamId = :teamId </#if> <#if updateTime?exists && updateTime != ""> AND updateTime = :updateTime </#if> <#if updateUser?exists && updateUser != ""> AND updateUser = :updateUser </#if> <#if videoUrl?exists && videoUrl != ""> AND videoUrl = :videoUrl </#if> <#if createUser?exists && createUser != ""> AND createUser = :createUser </#if> <#if userId?exists && userId != ""> AND userId = :userId </#if> <#if title?exists && title != ""> AND title = :title </#if> <#if createTime?exists && createTime != ""> AND createTime = :createTime </#if> <#if id?exists && id != ""> AND id = :id </#if> <#if orderBy?exists && orderBy!="" && orderType?exists> ORDER BY :orderBy :orderType </#if>
